idea:
VXL Software is a truly global company – and is a world leader in software development for Embedded OS, Thin clients solutions, Work from home technologies, Enterprise mobility / unified endpoint management, PC repurposing & digital signage. Visit us at https://www.vxlsoftware.com


Has a proven track record, with a pedigree stretching back over 7 years. VXL Software is a trusted supplier to organizations around the globe. VXL has built an enviable worldwide reputation for high-quality software for digital signage, unified endpoint management and PC repurposing/thin-client migration. Developed to be both powerful and affordable, VXL’s software consistently sets new standards for both performance and value.


Our goal is always to deliver world-class software; software that solves business problems efficiently – at the most affordable price.

A changing world always needs new ideas – ideas created by the brave; by companies which aren’t afraid to challenge accepted thinking as a means to deliver products which are more effective, more powerful and more economical. VXL Software couples this innovation with quality: an unswerving attention to detail that results in solid, reliable, enterprise-class applications.


VXL operates right across the globe, from its own locations and via a network of partners and resellers. VXL has a presence in the USA, UK, France, Germany, the United Arab Emirates, India and Singapore. VXL’s Americas group is headquartered in Houston, Texas. The European headquarter is in Manchester, UK. VXL’s 150+ software development team, and the Asia Pacific headquarters, are based in Mumbai, India.


For VXL, ‘quality’ isn’t a glib marketing label – it’s a way of life.

We strive to engineer everything we do to perfection – from our powerful software applications to our world-class support, our aim is always to deliver the best possible experience for our customers. Mindful that businesses depend on our software, we work closely with customers when developing new features – while our rigorous testing methodology provides a controlled and dependable deployment process.

Value, performance and innovative features are at the heart of our software-development ethos.


Our heritage as a world leader in thin-client, cloud and virtualised computing gives us a unique insight into the needs of software users – and has underpinned the creation of our outstanding range of software. This includes Fusion UEM, a unified endpoint management software, which makes mobile and static device management easier and more affordable; Cloud Desktop, which quickly and easily repurposes PCs as thin clients, Cloud Desktop On the Go for on-demand access to VDI environments – and Illumineye DS (Digital Signage), a powerful and easy-to-use digital signage software and media player solution.


We have contracts in place already with 2 large multinational OEMs - Lenovo and LG Electronics to supply software for all their thin clients sold worldwide. In addition, we have signed a new agreement with a new OEM in France – Impact Technology similarly for software to be installed in all their thin clients.
name: VXL Software Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Aztecaage Consultant Private Limited

idea:
We're are creating a social media platform. I know it's not 2005 anymore nobody wants another social media but you know what, some serious problems got created on the way.


What we do is unlike others who tried to transition social media and some are trying today as well. 


We actually are transitioning core product of social media. Us the users. 


And let me tell you how.


I noticed that most of the social media users have one thing in common. Depression.


This depression never goes away even with the help of therapies, because it's the person's mindset. If it goes away once then they get depressed on another topic.


Social media becomes an escape sometimes for already depressed people. While it doesn't make it any better it just multiplies it.


How we solve this is using Happy Mode.


What happens here is very few creators selected by us, post some serious mental well-being content. As the world is going virtual, social media gets the most screen time. So it does makes sense.


That's how I got resurrected.


We have also established some new methods for creators, Influencers, Memers to make money. They won't have to rely on stupid third party ads for money.  Eg page associate, matching feature, etc


While social e-commerce will also get to thrive here. With our new tools. DFTs, tuned social media marketing, etc.


Along with some exciting features.


So there you go everything a human being wants money and happiness.
name: Tenet

idea: At Jaey, we sell premium-quality, tailor-made, customizable western work outfits for women. We use an AI-enabled measuring technology to accurately capture measurements of customers using just 2 photos in just 2 mins, and use these measurements to make tailor-made outfits in Size: YOU. Our designs are inspired by global workwear cultures, something that's difficult to find in India at affordable prices.
name: JAEY LIFESTYLE PRIVATE LIMITED
